Summary: over top of full moon Me, 2 friends saw something in the sky that looked as if it was on fire,
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Vallejo
There were 2 other sightings in Vallejo on or around May 5th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and 2 friends,were standing in our driveway,shooting the bull, on a full moon night,between 9PM, and 10:30pm.When I saw what first appeared to be something that looked like an aircraft,on fire, at about 30,000 FT. It was higher than the full moon. Moving from South to north direction, slowed down ,stoped,and hovered eradicially momentarally. Then reversed course and headed back south getting less firely looking as it travled,turning into just a high flying not so brite white light, as it faded away going up in a southerly direction, and out of sight. Me and my two friends talked about it during the sighting and after it was gone.None of us knew what was.Just a very strange sight to see we all agreed.
